title: TECH-175 Remove Won't Dos
body:
## 🚀 Changes & Notes

- I have read to many won't do comments that never happened, I'm not gonna approve any new ones any more
- Eslint config that marks them as an error, yes error
- Turned existing comments into ticket if they had none and were potentially still relevant

## 📜 PR Checklist

**Developer:**

- [x] 🚧 Manually test the changes yourself
- [x] 🧐 Review the PR yourself
~🧪 Add automated tests (**mandatory for Backend/Shared** code, otherwise optional)~
~📸 **For Frontend Changes**: Add screenshots and recordings of the changed UI~
~🗂 **For Database Changes**: Add DB indices if you introduced new MongoDB operations that are not yet covered~

**Reviewer:**

- [ ] 😈 Try to break it (manually test it)
- [ ] 🔬 Try to find bugs & suggest ways to improve the code, add missing docs

*Don't forget to assign yourself and celebrate the approval with a gif ;)*
